main event: A witness observed a bright, glowing object moving rapidly in the sky over New York City on July 7, 1952.
interesting points: The object appeared metallic in nature and performed unusual maneuvers, accelerating and decelerating rapidly., No sound was associated with the object., The sighting lasted for several minutes before the object disappeared from view., The report was investigated by Project Blue Book personnel., The case was classified as Unidentified.
sighted object: a bright, glowing metallic object in the sky
witness description: the witness reported observing the object
